title: Desert rose of Qatar
caption: Desert rose of Qatar
desc: International Museum Day brings us to Qatar, a small but wealthy nation on the Arabian Peninsula, surrounded by the waters of the Persian Gulf and bordered by Saudi Arabia to the south. In the capital city of Doha you’ll find its National Museum, shown here, which opened in March 2019.
copyright: National Museum of Qatar in Doha, Qatar (© Hasan Zaidi/Shutterstock)
